00019 RemapPort::RemapPort(QDomNode &remapPortNode): value_(QString()),
00020 portNameRef_(QString()), portIndex_(-1) {
00021 
00022         // get the attributes
00023         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = remapPortNode.attributes();
00024 
00025         // get the portNameRef attribute and strip the whitespace characters
00026         portNameRef_ = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:portNameRef")).
00027                         childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00028         portNameRef_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(portNameRef_);
00029 
00030         QString portIndex = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:portIndex")).
00031                         childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00032         if (!portIndex.isNull()) {
00033                 portIndex_ = portIndex.toInt();
00034         }
00035 
00036         value_ = remapPortNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00037 
00038         // if mandatory elements are missing
00039         if (value_.isNull()) {
00040                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value for spirit:remapPort"
00041                                 " missing"));
00042         }
00043 
00044         if (portNameRef_.isNull()) {
00045                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory attribute spirit:portNameRef"
00046                                 " missing in spirit:remapPort"));
00047         }
00048         return;
00049 }

00072 void RemapPort::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00073         if (value_.isEmpty()) {
00074                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value for spirit:remapPort is"
00075                                 " missing"));
00076         }
00077 
00078         // start the remapPort element
00079         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:remapPort");
00080 
00081         // if mandatory portNameRef is empty
00082         if (portNameRef_.isEmpty()) {
00083                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:portNameRef"
00084                                 " is missing"));
00085         }
00086         else {
00087                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:portNameRef", portNameRef_);
00088         }
00089 
00090         // if optional portIndex is positive its written
00091         if (portIndex_ >= 0) {
00092             writer.writeAttribute("spirit:portIndex", QString::number(portIndex_));
00093         }
00094 
00095         // write the remapPort element value after attributes and close tag
00096         writer.writeCharacters(value_);
00097         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:remapPort
00098         return;
00099 }
